name: Leo Santana
description: '''Leandro Silva de Santana Improta''' (born 22 April 1988), better known by his artistic name '''Leo Santana''', is a Brazilian singer, composer, and percussionist. He first achieved success as a member of the band {{ill|Parangol√©|pt}}, and would afterwards have a successful solo career, releasing hit singles throughout the 2010s and 2020s.
